Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package DLV

Interface Summary
Directive Interface for DLV directives.
 

Class Summary
ConversionType The class that defines the constants that are used to identify generic DLV Wrapper types.
DirectiveHandler  
Dlv This is a wrapper class that allows to call DLV from a Java program.
DLV_InvocationException This exception is trown if any error is occurred during DLV invocation.
DLVException This is the ancestor class of all (checked) Exception classes which are contained in DLV package.
DLVWarningException This exception is trown if you call a method like Dlv.callAndRedirectInAFile(String) and DLV outputs some warning in standard error.
ExportDirective This class represent an ExportDirective.
Ielpa  
ImportDirective This class represents an ImportDirective.
Model This class represents a Model of a logic program (output of DLV).
ODBCDirective This class represent an ODBCDirective.
Predicate This class allows to handle predicates (which corresponds to tables in a relational database).
PredicateMetaData An object that can be used to get information about the types and properties of the "columns" in a Predicate object (in a relational database view of predicates).
Program This class represents a logic program input of DLV.
ResultSetHandler This class allows to use a java.sql.ResultSet as a fact source.
Tester  
Tools This class provide some useful static methods.
TranslationMap This class allows to specify how to convert a source "table" in a destination "table".
 

Exception Summary
BadArityException This exception is trown if you try to construct a Fact specifying an incorrect number of terms.
BadColumnNameException This exception is trown if the specified name does not correspond to a position.
DLVExceptionUncheked This is the ancestor class of all (unchecked) Exception classes which are contained in DLV package.
InvalidParameterException This exception is trown if you insert an ivalid parameter.
InvalidValueException This exception is trown if you try to get a value from a Predicate with an incorrect method.
IsNoModelException This exception is trown if you call a method and this object represents no model.
NoModelsComputed This exception is trown if you call a method to handle the output of DLV before the execution of DLV.
NoSuchFactException This exception is thrown if you try to get, from a predicate, a fact which doesn't exist.
NoSuchModelException This exception is trown if is asked to DLV_Manager istance a model that not exists.
NoSuchPredicateException This exception is thrown if you try to get, from a model, a predicate which doesn't exist.
NoSuchTermException This exception is thrown if you try to get, from a predicate, a term which doesn't exist.
ParserException This exception is trown if a syntax error is found.
